message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.IR 

This paper is about a neural model for cross-lingual word alignment, which is a task related to natural language processing and machine translation. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also introduces a novel discriminative word alignment model, which involves machine learning techniques, making cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Learning) likely sub-categories as well. Additionally, the paper evaluates the model's performance on data projection for Chinese NER, which is a task related to information retrieval (cs.IR) and named entity recognition (cs.NE).
